divs: Sighting DetailsThis is probably the same light that was posted from the st.charles il incident.I spotted it in WoodDale which is maybe 10 miles east from st.charles.The object appeared to be a solid white light.The sun was setting in the west so my first thought was that it might be the international space station or a satelite.However,i am close to Chicago,in the metro area,and I live about 3-4 miles from O'hare,so I have never seen satelites in this area.The object did not change speed or deviate from it's flight path,but did appear to be at a very high altitude.One of O'hare's flight path is right above my house(landing)and the flights were never interupted. I noticed the object while taking out the garbage,it was just s-se of me traveling in the same direction.O'hare is east of my location.I lost sight of the object as it cleared the roof of my house.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wood Dale
This sighting has never been favorited.
